Summary: The Pipeline Designer will produce as-built drawings of Gathering facilities and pipelines using AutoCAD, CADWORX, and CADWORX P&ID. This position will also be responsible for preparing “Issued for Construction” drawings for use in capital projects, as well as updating and maintaining an electronic filing system of the database for pipeline drawings, etc.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

• Preparation and updating of I&E, P&ID, and PFD of current facilities.

• Site/Plot plan development.

• Support Regulatory Affairs function for filings, maps, plot plans, etc.

• Develop and maintain as-built drawings of facilities and pipelines.

• Prepare fabrication drawings of proposed facilities including bill of materials.

• Draft drawings from sketches, verbal conversations, and field visits.

• Provide support on bid documents of major facilities for capital projects.

• Consult with Engineering, Operations, and GIS.

• Moderate level of travel may be required

Qualifications: To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skills, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Education and experience: Associate’s degree (A.A.) or equivalent from a two-year college or technical school, and five plus years related experience.

Computer Skills: Must possess high level of proficiency in using AutoCAD. Position also requires proficiency with CADWORX and CADWORX P&ID, MS Word, Excel, and Visio.

Other Skills and Abilities:

• The successful candidate must have the mathematical aptitude to apply mathematical concepts in statistical inference, probability, trigonometry, and geometry.

• Must apply fractions, percentages, ratios, and proportion concepts to practical situations.

• The ability to effectively communicate in written form and verbally with various levels within the organization as well as external clients.
